message:
lot of Thanks again.  
two more questions:  
1) QBWI - if I implement this where can i see the logs and exceptions ?  
2) Regarding the 401, I found this is not because of Load balanced. Actually for our application we use only the IIS-Windows authentication. but it seems the background task expects the Anonymous authentication. Because When I enabled Anonymous authentication, my background task are run successfully, but if disable and just keeping the windows authentication, it gives 401.  
Kindly help me.
